module.name: part_template_shape_with_parameters
module.name.french: Forme du modèle du composant avec paramètres
module.keywords: module, shape, properties, electrical, analysis, simulation, template, geometric model

abstract.li: identification of a template as a geometric template;
the geometric model of a template under certain material and environment conditions;
keepout constraints of a template for specific purposes under certain material and environment conditions;

purpose.p: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the representation of shape characterization data for template models. Data related to environment, material condition, thermal, generic_clearance, shock, vibration, electromagnetic_compatibility is supported.

inscope.li: identification of a template as a geometric template;
the geometric model of a template under certain material and environment conditions;
keepout constraints of a template for specific purposes under certain material and environment conditions;
items within the scope of application module Non feature shape element, ISO/TS 10303-1706;
items within the scope of application module Physical layout template, ISO/TS 10303-1722;
items within the scope of application module Shape parameters, ISO/TS 10303-1743.
